title: Get to Know Similarweb From the Knowledge Base | Similarweb
description: Discover how to use Similarweb's new knowledge base to get the most out of your data analysis. Improve your insights and make data-driven decisions faster.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesGet to Know Similarweb's Research Intelligence with our New Knowledge Base Updates Get to Know Similarweb’s Research Intelligence with our New Knowledge Base Start your free trial by Natalie Halimi 1 Min. July 22, 2014 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic We’ve created a new knowledge base that will help you to navigate through Similarweb’s Research Intelligence to understand its benefits and specific uses for your own industry and requirements. The articles and videos are organized around the conversion funnel stages: Audience, Acquisition and Conversion. Under each of these steps you’ll fine specific uses cases such as: Discover Your Audience’s Interests (located under Audience > Interests) Find out Which Ad Networks and Banners Your Competitors Are Using (located under Acquisition > Media Buying) These articles and videos are also available directly in your Similarweb Research Intelligence dashboard. You can access them by clicking the ‘Need Help?’ button located in the top right side of the screen. We will be continuing to add more case studies, use cases, webinars and video tutorials that will help you learn how to make the most out the unlimited web traffic data available on Similarweb Research Intelligence platform. If you have specific questions, don’t hesitate to contact us. by Natalie Halimi Natalie Halimi has over 10 years of marketing experience across B2C and B2B sectors. Related Topics: Product Updates This post is subject to Similarweb legal notices and disclaimers.
